summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2289, for the improvement of 1st Avenue South from Holgate Street to a point 240 feet south of the south margin of Hanford Street, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 23594 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
